data.name: AMV Maker for Vroid VRM and MMD Mac Supported
data.detailed_description:
DAN☆SING! is a tool to help you create music video with your avatar with few clicks.
You would load your avatar and motion files in the tools. The tool is also integrated with an intuitive timeline system.
You would set camera movement, VFX effect, caption and even particle effects with it.

Demo version is here.
https://vtubershop.booth.pm/items/3366941

More than 20 pre-built stages.


Some other functions are listed below. More features will be added later.

Functions supported
  • VMD camera import
  • Multiple avatars
  • Facial expression control
  • VRM/PMX avatar file import
  • Stage import (pmx and glb)
  • Vroid Hub integrated



  • Props System
  • BVH and VMD motion file import
  • Webm.mp4 video import
  • Rich camera movement library (more than 10 )
  • Pre-built particle effects

This provides another solution to Miku Miku Dance
data.about_the_game:
DAN☆SING! is a tool to help you create music video with your avatar with few clicks.
You would load your avatar and motion files in the tools. The tool is also integrated with an intuitive timeline system.
You would set camera movement, VFX effect, caption and even particle effects with it.

More than 20 pre-built stages.

data.short_description: DAN☆SING! is a tool to help you create music video with your avatar with few clicks. You would upload your VRM avatar file, VMD motion file, webM video and music into it. This provides alternative solution to Miku Miku Dance. There is a lot of improvement space. We will keep pushing the boundary.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or better
  • Storage: 256 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400/AMD Ryzen 5 2600X or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A
  • Storage: 256 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or better
  • Memory: 2028 MB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: The default character, dance motion and music are provided from Vroid Studio and  Unity Chan official website respectively.
